metadata.title: API 510 Pressure Vessel Inspection Form Schema
metadata.description: Complete schema for API 510 pressure vessel inspection form with all fields, sections, and validation rules

aiInstructions.purpose: This schema helps the AI understand the complete form structure to generate appropriate JSON responses for form field updates
aiInstructions.responseFormat: When updating form fields, respond with JSON format: {"fieldId": "value"}

specialHandling.inspection-findings: For inspection-findings type fields, provide an array of finding descriptions as strings. The system will convert these to proper finding objects with metadata.
specialHandling.textarea: For textarea fields, provide detailed, well-formatted descriptions. These will be used directly as the field value.
specialHandling.radio: Use 'yes' or 'no' values for radio buttons
specialHandling.select: Use the exact value from the options array

examples.findingsField: {"weld-condition-findings": ["Visible porosity in weld joint", "Discoloration indicating overheating"]}
examples.textareaField: {"safety-concerns-details": "Defects in the weld may compromise structural integrity and require immediate assessment. The presence of porosity and pitting could lead to crack propagation under operational stresses."}
examples.multipleFields: {"weld-condition": "poor", "weld-condition-findings": ["Visible porosity in weld joint"], "safety-concerns": "yes", "safety-concerns-details": "Weld defects may compromise structural integrity."}

formSchema.title: Critical Findings
formSchema.label: Critical findings identified

formSchema.title: Critical Findings Details
formSchema.label: Please describe the critical findings in detail
formSchema.description: Detailed description of critical findings that could affect vessel safety or operation. Should include severity, potential consequences, and immediate actions required. Use professional, technical language appropriate for inspection documentation.
formSchema.example: Weld defects could lead to structural failure under operational pressures. The combination of porosity and pitting creates stress concentration points that may initiate crack formation. These critical findings require immediate attention and the vessel should not be returned to service until these issues are resolved.

formSchema.title: Safety Concerns
formSchema.label: Safety concerns identified

formSchema.title: Safety Concerns Details
formSchema.label: Please describe the safety concerns in detail
formSchema.description: Detailed description of safety concerns identified during inspection. Should include potential risks, implications, and recommended actions. Use professional, technical language appropriate for inspection documentation.
formSchema.example: Defects in the weld may compromise structural integrity and require immediate assessment. The presence of porosity and pitting could lead to crack propagation under operational stresses. These conditions pose a significant safety risk and should be addressed before returning the vessel to service.

formSchema.title: Recommendations
formSchema.label: Recommendations and actions required
formSchema.description: Detailed recommendations for actions required based on inspection findings. Should include specific actions, timelines, and follow-up requirements. Use professional, technical language appropriate for inspection documentation.
formSchema.example: 1. Conduct immediate repair of identified weld defects using qualified welding procedures. 2. Perform additional NDE testing on adjacent areas to ensure no further defects exist. 3. Schedule follow-up inspection within 3 months to verify repair effectiveness. 4. Implement enhanced monitoring program for this vessel during next operating cycle.

formSchema.description: Additional notes, observations, or comments about the inspection assessment. Should include any relevant information not captured in other fields. Use professional, technical language appropriate for inspection documentation.
formSchema.example: Overall vessel condition is acceptable with minor issues identified. The inspection was conducted under normal operating conditions. All required safety procedures were followed. Additional monitoring recommended for identified areas of concern.
